thread.title: A very nice and lovely place to stay in Paris.
thread.title_full: A very nice and lovely place to stay in Paris. - Review of Hotel Duette, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: redstelios
title: A very nice and lovely place to stay in Paris.
text: The time you get inside in this hotel gives you positive vibes.The accommodation is very nice and warm including the room.Beautiful neighborhood to stay there and many thanks to Mr.Benjamin and the rest of the staff who are very helpful and friendly.Finally hoping and waiting for the next time to visit Paris and this lovely hotel!
